title: Outstanding App!

review: Music for me is about how I‚Äôm feeling, what thoughts run through my head, my current environment I‚Äôm standing in.  The ability to instantaneously call up songs that relate to these moments is nothing short of amazing.  If I‚Äôm missing my late wife, I play a song we danced to.  If I‚Äôm thinking of being on my motorcycle, I can call up songs that reinforce those memories.  A really fantastic source of entertainment.
title: Mood Access

review: I‚Äôm giving three stars solely because it‚Äôs $13 a month for ‚Äòunlimited‚Äô even though I pay for prime TV. My only other complaint would be that I can‚Äôt seem to save a station, which may be user error. Otherwise this app is fantastic. I use it on a daily basis. Hopefully the price will come down to a reasonable amount so I can enjoy more content. A lot of the content I like most is only available with the unlimited package, and I will not pay as much for streaming music as I do for streaming video media.
title: Great App

review:
I listen to classical music as well as pop. Even while paying for the Unlimited features it is difficult to find specific pieces/movements to listen to. Even in album mode the movements can be in the wrong order, often it is impossible to tell which movement is which, the only way is to start listening to each track (really?!). There‚Äôs no searching category by composer. When I‚Äôm off WiFi there is no quick way to find what‚Äôs already downloaded on my phone.

It‚Äôs great to have access to so much music, but if you want more classical music fans you should make the app better for them!
title: Clumsy

review: I have had it for about about a year now and it‚Äôs great I like  the stations my mom has had for who knows how long and it‚Äôs really good and it‚Äôs good how it has an off line with it for when you don‚Äôt know internet or whatever but yeah really been enjoying it  I listen to music a lot! And this is the only app I use for my music soo I don‚Äôt have anything to complain or compare to so but yeah I really love it
title: Love it

review: Okay so my playlist is not going in order of how it was put, and I know that it doesn‚Äôt sound like a big problem but I‚Äôm the kind of person that what‚Äôs it to be in the order that it‚Äôs played so that I‚Äôm able to change it if I want. I‚Äôm going to try and restart my phone and if it doesn‚Äôt work I‚Äôm going to delete and add it back to my phone. And on top of this my songs keep leaving my playlists wth! I keep having to re-add them
title: Stupid

review: I‚Äôm liking this app less and less due to not being able to drag between different parts of a track. The dot that represents the part of the track I‚Äôm on just bounces back to its original position when I try to drag it. If I don‚Äôt get a response on if this is normal and for legal purposes or if it‚Äôs just a bug that they haven‚Äôt found then I‚Äôll go ahead and cancel my subscriptions including prime. title: Fast forward and reverse

review: I love everything about this!  Having Alexa there to ask for a song is my favorite feature!!!  The options for creating playlists is endless- something I use a great deal, I don‚Äôt always want to hear the same type of music.  I highly recommend this, you won‚Äôt regret it- I play it through my phone and my computer with the same great results.
title: Best music app I‚Äôve ever used!

review: Garden-variety songs offered even to prime members. Very good music, for those who appreciate good music not top 40 garbage, have to pay additional exorbitant pricing. Unlimited music is overpriced! Case in point my original list comprised of many JJ Cale selections, only could be eliminated unless I pay the exorbitant unlimited price. As a business consultant. You might want to re-calibrate this policy! I stand ready to help you
title: Good butCould be much better!

review: I love that there are no commercials, but it really bugs me that already paying for a prime membership doesn‚Äôt include the prime music ‚Äúwhole package‚Äù and that anything you download from amazons ‚Äúincluded songs‚Äù expire.  Recently I have been listening to Disturbed Radio and have been running into songs from artists like James Blunt... I think the station has been mixed with something much softer unfortunately.  I‚Äôd give a 3.5 if it was available.
title: Overall great

review: I love the streaming service, but I wish we could stream on more than one device at a time.  Also, I will download songs and make playlists for workout classes and then some of my songs randomly disappear and are no longer available, which messes up the timing of the class if I don‚Äôt catch it beforehand.
title: Good option for streaming music, but has a few flaws

review: I pay for prime but then you want me to pay that again just for the music app...an app that is glitchy...won‚Äôt work at all sometimes and the contact us feature to report a problem is like jumping through hoops...the music content you do provide is ok but then one day my favorite songs just randomly disappear and become unlimited like some sort of random hostage situation...prime is barely worth what I pay for it...I don‚Äôt even use prime video not sure why I still have any of it...thanks for reminding me to cancel my prime membership before it renews.
title: Meh, unimpressive

review: Overall it‚Äôs a really great streaming service. I like the way it‚Äôs set up with playlists, artists, albums, songs, and genres, and that everything‚Äôs in alphabetical order so it‚Äôs easy to find. My main complaint is that there‚Äôs no ‚Äútop played‚Äù playlist like on Apple Music and other websites. I know that seems like a small issue and yeah it is, but I would definitely give a higher star review if that were the case. There are a handful of other annoyances with this app but overall it‚Äôs a very nice streaming service and I love that it‚Äôs cheaper than others!üòú
title: I mostly like it!

review: Often loses songs that I have downloaded which I thought would be saved to my phone and then I lose them completely and it says buffering. I assumed that when they were downloaded to the phone they would not be lost based on location. Apparently I was mistaken
title: Ability to play in all areas without losing service and buffering

review: Quick navigation right off the bat! This app makes it easy to explore a wide variety of music in rapid succession. Easy-to-use screen controls. Love the available scrolling lyrics which add another dimension to the music. The album covers and artwork add color and additional interest. Looking for improvements in the future to add increased versatility and even more functionality.
title: Amazing app with unlimited potential

review: The App is horrible with Apple Car Play and Sonos. Second, being limited to music is one thing but playing the same music or playlist over and over is another thing. You count on the first 10-15 songs being the same no matter what station you select. Always. Boring. Apple Car Play: It always crashes. Doesn‚Äôt show the music. It goes into some sort of monotone version when you open the app. Just bad. Sonos: it always tells me I‚Äôm logged in somewhere else. I gave up. I would not pay for this service if it wasn‚Äôt included in Prime.
title: Prime Version

review: I really like that I can download music with this app. The music it has is great, no ads, amazing radios tailored to you BUT it doesn‚Äôt have ALL music included with your prime account. Some music, especially new and popular songs, require you to have a prime music unlimited account for an extra cost. If I could, I‚Äôd give this app a 4.5 rating because it‚Äôs great but sometimes it annoys me that I can‚Äôt listen to everything considering I‚Äôm already paying for prime
title: Pretty good

review: Wish I knew about this sooner. I really like the available songs and artists. But I think the user interface could be easier or mor intuitive. Maybe I haven‚Äôt spent enough time on the app, but I find it difficult to organize downloaded songs or albums, figure out where things are located, and navigate through songs to find out further details as they are playing. Also wish there was a way to make a favorites list. Playlist? Need to play with it more.
title: Cool

review: I have used this app on my iPad for several years now, and love it very much. Today I bought a new iPhone. I tried downloading and opening the app but it will not let me sign in. The app just freezes and hangs at the sign in page. I know I am using the correct password, because I‚Äôm using it from my save password lists. I also tried entering it manually. Either way whenever I type anything into that sign in page, and try to hit sign in, it just freezes. I also tried uninstalling and reinstalling the app. It seems that the iPhone version does not work at all. What a shame. I guess it‚Äôs time to switch to iTunes. All that music lost.
title: Will not work on iPhone

review: This app is so wonderful. It has allowed us to listen to all sorts of world and classical music that we can‚Äôt find anywhere else. If you want your kids to have exposure to all sorts of classical music, not just the ‚Äúgreatest hits‚Äú that iTunes tends to carry, go for it! I have never not been able to find a recording by a classical artist, no matter how obscure and for that alone is worth the cost.
title: Homeschool moms rejoice

review: This app is pretty well made and runs well but there are a few things that could be better. Playlists should be able to be customized alphabetically or any other way that would allow easy access if you are looking for a particular song. Also, the browse section would be easier to use if you could browse a genre or some sort of top 100 to find new music. All in all a great app but in would be much better if you could add new features like these.
title: Ok but...

review:
Love it!   I listen to this app every single 
day .  It starts my day with any song I want 
from every generation.  I have a wide variety of musical interests and feel as though I can travel through time keeping the beat .  Keeps my mood positive and makes each day better.  I have a memory 
for every song.  This app brings happiness and joy to my life .  A must have for every music lover !

At this rate I‚Äôll just start buying the albums.

review: I spend a lot of time on here listening to worship songs and building playlists. I noticed the developers did a good job at making it functional and practical. review:

Supporting the Apple Music api so you can browse from your auto stereo would be a fantastic addition.

Off line storage is great for saving battery or when you‚Äôre out of cellular data range.
title: Pretty good and improving

I‚Äôve discovered that the app only downloads offline music while playing a song. I‚Äôve listened to the first minute of the same info for about 30 minutes. Not good.

title: Pretty good

BUT - tell it to play an artist, or a genre, and you are guaranteed to hear the same 15 songs in a similar order every. time. For a service that appears to have every song ever recorded, why can‚Äôt it just shuffle the songs?!  It‚Äôs so frustrating we tried to switch to Apple Music, even though it‚Äôs $2 more a month, but we use these services almost exclusively on Echos and (surprise) the Apple Music skill for Alexa is garbage.
title: Seriously limited variety

review: I use it all the time it‚Äôs like the only music app I use it‚Äôs great you can download songs and you can listen to all your favorites you can also turn explicit filter on and off for your preference. It‚Äôs nice easy and awesome to use and if you don‚Äôt have Internet where you are you can download songs when you‚Äôre at home so you can listen to them wherever whenever.
title: It‚Äôs great

review: This is the first music app I have enjoyed with unlimited content. It's simple to organize and play your Prime music content. The interface is intuitive. Your music also syncs across all your devices. The content spans many generations and genres of music. Best of all, it comes with my Prime membership.  However, I wish Prime music stays as Prime  music.  A lot of them disappear and are no longer prime.
title: Simple and elegant music app

review: Better than the rest. Just wish there were more newer songs. Loses one star because songs need to be accessed better. The way songs are filed needs to be simpler. If you add song to the play que you should be able to see the next song instead it plays the next song on the playlist. Also stop asking me to rate the app. I already did it once.  Loses another star for continually asking me to rate. Also having major streaming issues with this version.
title: Love the app!

review: Not 5 stars because they take songs off and put on music unlimited. If they left the songs on there, it would be 5 stars. The app will also default to several songs you play rather than the entire album. So you have to search for the album again then click it or you just get 2-3 songs on repeat. Just annoying.
title: Good music

review: Didn‚Äôt even know that this was part of the ‚ÄúPrime‚Äù package.  Pretty wide selection.  Wish they‚Äôd update which songs were prime and which were unlimited more often. Been using for about a year and a half, and I don‚Äôt think anything that came out recently and was unlimited has migrated to the more restricted list.  But it still a good service and variety.  And you can download the list for times you‚Äôre out of service.
title: Fun surprise

review:
Occasionally it can‚Äôt understand your request - so it‚Äôs not perfect and doesn‚Äôt play play what you requested. I often have repeated the same song and artist and it played something else ?!

The other complaint is finding the same songs in the same genre - not sure how they determine what and why but they seem off sometimes.

Otherwise, I feel the app is exceptional but there is always room for improvement

review: We have had the family plan for the past 2 months and we all absolutely love it. We can all create our own play lists, and just ask to listen to a specific artist. I just wish the songs and artist were all available. Meaning songs/ artists are available for a while n then they take it down. I wish all was available all the time.
title: Absolutely Love it

review:
I have discovered music from my childhood, songs I‚Äôve never heard but now love, and explored genres I didn‚Äôt think I would like and now do because I can tailor each station to my taste. 

The only drawback is that I‚Äôd like to be able to dislike an artist so their songs don‚Äôt play at all but I can only dislike one song at a time as it plays.
title: Love the station options and song variety.

review:
I love the app so much and probably listen to it a couple hours a day. But with the update, the new app icon looks ugly in my opinion.  The bright blue doesn‚Äôt complement the app at all. The old color was a good color that was similar to the colors in the app itself.  The new one is an eye sore. Of course it‚Äôs just my opinion, but I feel many agree, that the new color in the logo is ugly.

Thank you
title: Please change the app icon back

review:
They constantly remove music or songs that you have previously downloaded and they say...‚Äùwe‚Äôre sorry this song is no longer available.‚Äù  Even after months or years of having it.  They are decade old songs too and I‚Äôm talking every time I log in, I find about ten songs or more they have suddenly removed!  Find another music app..I‚Äôm ready to stop paying for this one.  Forget about free shipping, it‚Äôs not worth it!
I decided to try again after my first chance at this, but the same thing is happening!
title: Not worth it!

review: This site reminds me on being at work on a progressive radio station in the 70‚Äôs! Like to see interviews with musicians. I lived with musicians in college and was often inside radio station during broadcasts! Everyone involved with music sees the world in beats, rhythms and I should note that all I knew was life is good but find the right cords to play that feeling ! Can‚Äôt get enough of music these days thanks
title: Top notch music library

review:
First of all, I am a Prime Customer so having access to a no commercial music service is a nice benefit. However, the recent addition of the ‚Äòunlimited‚Äô service feature has reduced the number of titles/songs available. Basically, leaving the customer with the lesser known, outdated material rather than the more popular, current titles for an up-charge. 

So overall it‚Äôs a nice-to-have in that you can actually save content to your device and listen disconnected. Thats about it...
title: Good, not great...

review: App freezes constantly and needs to be restarted, crashes all the time, and has a limited music selection compared to other apps. The last straw was when it crashed about a week ago and wouldn‚Äôt work for about 2 days straight. When it finally started up again, my main playlist of over 600 songs was reduced to under 300 songs. Also, nearly all the songs in all of my playlists had been removed from my music library and undownloaded. Now I try to download them back and add them to my music library and I can‚Äôt. **** Jeff Bezos and this ******* app.
title: App doesn‚Äôt work

review:
For at least 6 months the music playing in this app is turning into a garbled mess. It inserts other songs into the currently playing songs. Then it just goes to this horrible screeching static. 
It doesn‚Äôt matter what type of unit I use to access the app. iPhone, iPad, computer all play the same garbled mess. Deleting and reinstalling the app does no good. This happens on WiFi, cellular or direct internet connection. 
One would think that with their constant updates they would have fixed this by now.
If I wasn‚Äôt already paying for Prime I would have ditched this app a long time ago.
title: App is severely lacking support

review: First off, the app is great. But as my music library grows, the app has gotten slow at loading my playlists despite all being downloaded to my phone. And has begun crashing when I pause it/ or while mid song and I have to restart that song. But once I do that it picked back up where it was. So if y‚Äôall could work on that, I got a lot of music I‚Äôd hate to have to transfer to another service
title: Slow/ glitchy

review:
I like how the app categorizes things like ‚Äòrecently added‚Äô but when you go into that area all you see are individual songs.  I would prefer to see it arranged and grouped by album 
, that way I can easily add an entire album, not individual songs, to a playlist or queue.  A real music enthusiast, searching for new stuff, isn‚Äôt going to select individual songs to sample‚Äî what can be gleaned from that???

It‚Äôs a good app but could be far better and more intuitive....
title: Could be better....

review: Stop shoving what you think I might like in my face, and do like other streaming apps: give me a ‚ÄúContinue Listening‚Äù right at the top of the home page, consistently, instead of making me hunt for the station I was listening to last time. And I listen to two pop artists. Two. And rarely. Just because other people who listened to P!nk and Macklemore listened to whatever else doesn‚Äôt mean I‚Äôm interested. Why are there so many pop suggestions? Classical, musicals, instrumental, country, instrumental, soundtracks, instrumental soundtracks, and more instrumental. Not pop. Your algorithm needs improvement. Ugh.
title: Too many suggestions

review:
I like this app for the music and the podcasts. 
My issue is that the podcasts can be a bit difficult to navigate. Sometimes when I get leave the app and then return, it doesn't save the podcast my current podcast and where I left off. It also randomly unfollows my favorites. Other than that, great app.
title: Music is great  - podcasts could work better

review:
I didn‚Äôt even want to try "unlimited". I was tricked into it by the huge "one touch" button to join unlimited and the tiny "no, just play some darn music" button under it. Bumped the big button accidentally , and immediately quit unlimited, but the damage was done: I'm condemned to a month long free trial. (It's supposed to be longer, but I've never managed to activate the longer trial special offers, or the one that came with my Galaxy S10+. In retrospect, thank God!)

I have no idea where to find those millions of songs, but "my station" turned to crap. It activated brand new bugs, and lots of them. Day after day the first song is always Cat Stevens. It's like I don‚Äôt even want to click on that any more. Unlimited has given me a Cat Stevens aversion, just like something out of "A Clockwork Orange".

I swear, they keep finding new and worse places to hide the "most recently listened" list. 

How did this thing get a 4.7? Are y'all blind?
title: Unlimited ruined everything!

review: The app is working fine and then they had to do an update...again. Now I can‚Äôt even tell by the graphics who the artists are unless I go right up to my iPad and look. Ok so you can see the lyrics on the right. For me I could care less, since I am working. I don‚Äôt or shouldn‚Äôt be reading the lyrics. I should be working. I only want to know who is singing and the name of the song. Staying at 4 stars.
title: An update?  Really?  Leave it alone guys and gals

review: I love this app, it‚Äôs easy to use and I like a lot of the stations. BUT sometimes certain songs won‚Äôt work after awhile and you won‚Äôt be notified. I think you should be able to have a suggestion or request section because there are some songs and artists that aren‚Äôt in their system which is a bummer.

review: I used to be able to play an album or download a song with my Prime Membership, but, now that businesses do not already make enough money, customers have to upgrade to get the newest available songs.  Same thing when you want to watch a certain movie.  That makes me disappointed, especially when the CEO is on the Forbes highest earners list.  People forget about the little people........
title: Disappointed

review: I don‚Äôt like that you have to pay to listen to a certain artist or ‚Äútop‚Äù songs. They should be included in the membership. Especially for Prime members. I‚Äôm already paying for Prime, why not stream music without limitations as a perk for members. All of the most popular songs are part of the ‚Äúunlimited‚Äù package and won‚Äôt play without a subscription service.
title: Song options

review: When it works it‚Äôs awesome. But for me it frequently shuts down in the middle of playing when streaming to a connect device (either Bluetooth or USB, and no it‚Äôs not the connected device because it happens on every one of them) and I have to restart the app. It doesn‚Äôt just stop playing...the app is shut down completely. It‚Äôs a significant flaw....unless my iPhone is shutting it down intentionally because of the competition between music services....but that can‚Äôt be possible because that sounds like an unfair trade practice.
title: Seriously flawed

review: Great catalog and quality of music.  Plays great on my very expensive speakers and my $100 Bluetooth poolside.   Only criticism is it can‚Äôt play multichannel or Dolby Atmos music.  Yes I know they claim it can via th echo speaker but that‚Äôs laughable.  I want to play on my 7.1.4 theater.  May switch one day when someone gives me that option but for now this is the best quality/price/selection option for me.
title: Great selection Great Quality

review:
This is my go to for all music - new and old. Easy to use and it is great to have my music with me at a click. Keep up the great work. 

I would love to see some more out of print stuff become available. Looking at albums like Peter Wolf Light‚Äôs Out and John Stewart Bombs Away Dream Babies. These albums are great and it would be wonderful for a new generation of listeners to hear this great music. 

Great music is timeless, please help keep it alive!
title: LOVE IT

review:
Only drawback is that some songs are pulled back out of your save list probably due to licensing agreements. All and all very good music app. Worth the cost.
I was going to stop there but I keep getting asked to rate this app and just remembered it makes you pick a nickname that will almost always be taken. So you end up having to figure out a dumb name or keep getting asked to rate the app over and over. 
Had 4 stars but now three for making me go through this to get the message removed!
title: Really good

review: I use this app almost every day. Keeps me sane. Good collections of classical music & Jazz. I‚Äôve only stumped search a few times. I wish there were more search options. In particular, search can‚Äôt tell difference between a performer & a composer, e.g., Berg Quartet vs Alban Berg composer. Also, some of classical performances are quite old with poor fidelity. I‚Äôm also not a fan of some stations. Classical ones frequently only play one movement of a multi- movement work.

review: The ‚Äúsongs for you‚Äù will only play the first list of songs and stops unless you keep scrolling to the end of the lists in order for the music to keep continuing. Also, the music choices for ‚Äúsongs for you‚Äù have a poor choice in music, especially when they put the same song on the list that I repeatedly skip. If I skip a song 100%, why keep putting the song on the list? Ah, I don‚Äôt like the song.........the bottom line, I do not care for the newer changes to the app.
title: Not a fan of how the songs for you now works

review: Great service, Great app., except it does not sync well iPhone. Siri will not use commands to play, choose songs, etc. You have to press the ‚ÄúAlexa‚Äù button. Oft times the speakers don‚Äôt sync correctly (Bluetooth and through car stereo). In the car stereo oft times the front speakers will not play until I reboot the app. And it is very dangerous that I can‚Äôt speak to Siri for play or music choice and have to physically press the ‚ÄúAlexa‚Äù button.
title: Wish it synced better with iPhone

review: I love this app, but recently it has made me put on a station just to listen to ONE song. And these stations don‚Äôt even have unlimited skips, they don‚Äôt let you replay a song either. In the station, they don‚Äôt even play the song you put the station on for most of the time. Often times, songs that I HATE come on, and I have already used my skips up. It is extremely irritating and I can barely take it. Please fix this, I‚Äôm very disappointed.
title: Here‚Äôs the thing ( this is important)

review: My big two complaints are that you can‚Äôt sort songs alphabetically within a playlist, and that you can‚Äôt upload your own music into the app (I would like to be able to add some random music that isn‚Äôt available on and streaming service from the pre-streaming days). Also the feature to auto-add songs from your iTunes playlist that are available doesn‚Äôt work.
title: Pretty good, not perfect

review: The selection of music seems to be getting smaller. The app could be a little easier to maneuver around with. Also, THERE ARE NO ALBUM LINER NOTES! When playing an old album or learning about a new artist, I love reading about the album and the artist. How, where and when it was made. What‚Äôs the theme of the album? Liner notes are an integral part of a particular album and how the artist wants to convey this particular piece of music. How else does the listener learn about the artist and the music they are trying to convey? Additionally, I‚Äôve reached out to customer service for loading issues and I never heard back.
title: the music needs liner notes

review:
Please add the ability to delete a song from your library right from the now aging screen. We currently have to go to the actual album in order to delete it. It makes it clunky to modify your library..

title: Meh

It‚Äôs a huge hassle to toggle a switch every time I want to download music, toggle it again to add it to one of my offline playlists, THEN toggle it again if I want to search for anything else. Just group cloud and offline playlists together! Or have an option to stream/download only on WiFi. 
Another annoyance is how albums disappear all the time, but aren‚Äôt really taken off the app- you just have to redownload them and delete the grayed our old album. This is ridiculous- should be automatic unless the album is off the app for good 
Pretty basic stuff, hope they see this and fix it

review: Great app!! Love it as much as iTunes. I am an loyal Apple fan to the core however, their services can nickel & dime you to death. I have also been a Prime member for over 12 or more years & the services that you get as a Prime member can‚Äôt be touched by Apple thus far.  It is a rare occasion that I run across music that requires an ‚ÄúUnlimited‚Äù subscription. Most music is available for download with just a Prime membership.
title: Vast selection for Prime Members

review:
I get to listen to music as part of my Prime subscription. This is a great deal! 
All types of music and curated lists are available. So I can just listen to what other people have put together. Or make my own lists. But I do both. 
I would rate it 5 stars if they did not remove songs from their list of available songs you can play. This is NOT a paid subscription service so the amount of songs is limited.
title: Can‚Äôt beat it!

review: If you have prime or an echo, this is the way to go. They have innovated fast and it won‚Äôt be long until they have matched the competition. I really like the utterances I can tell Alexa, like ‚ÄúI don‚Äôt like this song‚Äù or ‚Äúplay my favorites.‚Äù I really think this paired with an echo will be the next generation of streaming services. Really nice that you get the Alexa voice assistant in the app as well.
title: Quality Streaming Service

review:
Found everything I was looking for. On a whim, I went looking for and found full albums from hair bands from the late eighties and early nineties that were difficult to find in even the ‚Äúhippest‚Äù indie record stores.
Completely satisfied in finding everything I was looking for in every genre.
Can‚Äôt say enough.
title: Better than having a know-it-all buddy who runs an indie record store

review: I had a couple of Pearl Jam and STP songs downloaded and was pleasantly surprised to find that I could listen to them in Prime. I found it interesting that once Unlimited was released, some of the songs that were available thru Prime were no longer. I get it but I just can‚Äôt justify the expense. Thanks for the App. It‚Äôs been a great experience. Too many clicks to get to the sleep timer.
title: Music comes and goes

review:
Overall, I very much like AMZ Music. The listing of lyrics while songs play is great. Very few hiccups in the music streaming. However, I have a couple issues:
1) When you search, an artist's albums are listed alphabetically. Give an option for listing them chronologically.
2) When an item is not available in Prime music, give a link to the item for download, and the option to sample it.
title: Very nice app, though missing a couple features

review: Its much easier to organize, navigate and find the songs you‚Äôre looking for in Amazon‚Äôs well designed music app compared to the user-UNfriendly iTunes app where buttons and features are too often moved, hidden or removed from update to update. Also, Amazon‚Äôs competitive subscription rate makes their music service a much better value than the other services out there.
title: Wayyy better than iTunes!

review: My whole family loves this App.  My father listens to music from the 30‚Äôs, 40‚Äôs, and 50‚Äôs, my son made his own playlist with music from Frank Sinatra to Pink, my husband can‚Äôt get enough of the Latin beat, my daughter loves everything Disney, and I have used it to help me with my walking workouts.  It is easy to use and I love the way it shows you the music/albums that you have listened to so you don‚Äôt have to go searching for your favorites.
title: Love, love, love this App!!

review:
In the setting for my iPhone, I have explicitly gone in and disabled the ability for my apps to ask me for reviews. Despite having done this a long time ago, I have now been asked twice by your app to review anyway. So here it is.

I go to play my Prime music to find that songs/albums/artists that used to be in there aren‚Äôt anymore. I would imagine new content is being added more or less just as frequently, but there is no discoverability for that. So to my experience, my library is getting smaller almost every time I use it.

If you have a Prime subscription anyway, use it. It has about 60% of what you want at no additional cost.
title: Here‚Äôs your review

review: Canceled my premium pandora account for this app. It‚Äôs a good alternative but has a way to go. Controls are too the UI isn‚Äôt great, but it‚Äôs a relatively new app. I‚Äôm sure it‚Äôll improve over time. Music takes way too long to load at times(most likely as a result of caching in bad service areas). Get rid of the forward and back buttons and go with swipe gestures! Overall very happy with this though, unlike pandora it plays nice and loud via lightning cable on my motorcycle.
title: Good pandora alternative

review: Although there are some features like displaying song lyrics that I like, it will probably never be my go-to app because it does not physically store any of my songs on my device. I know that goes against the whole idea of a cloud-based platform, but it makes life more annoying when you use your phone as a source of music while driving. If I am in an area where the connection to 4G is limited, I may very well get periods of silence. I never have that problem with iTunes because it is reading from my device.
title: It's okay

review: I‚Äôve bought a soundtrack so I could download it about 2 times already (the same song) and it‚Äôs stopped showing up in my downloaded list. I searched it up again and it told me that the song I was trying to play ‚Äúno longer existed‚Äù but it was still on Amazon‚Äôs main site, so that was confusing. It then told me to refresh or download the songs that previously existed on my app, and I‚Äôve done both, and the song I bought simply won‚Äôt play anymore. Terribly frustrating and disappointing.
title: Decent app, but annoying

review: Constantly and repeatedly stops the music to ask if I‚Äôm still listening. Problem is I have to stop whatever I‚Äôm doing, unlock my phone and tell it I‚Äôm still listening. This happens even if I‚Äôve been skipping songs and actively using the app.  Doesn‚Äôt help if you put it in driving mode and tell the app you are actively driving a car, they still require you to look at your phone and confirm you‚Äôre still listening every few songs!   Extremely annoying and dangerous when cutting the grass or driving! Please fix this!
title: Tired of being asked if I‚Äôm still listening

review: This app used to be my go-to for music. We‚Äôre Prime members and have also paid from time to time, but the last several months makes me want to completely rule that option out. The stations never change up the music so I‚Äôm constantly hearing the same songs repeatedly, the app crashes and incessantly refreshes, particularly when I have it connected to anything Bluetooth. Isn‚Äôt that the WHOLE point? There‚Äôs no way I‚Äôd consider paying for an app that doesn‚Äôt function at its basic level. Pandora is a far better value, and I think I‚Äôll just shelf this one with my cassette tapes.
title: Sliding downhill

review: It took a little bit of getting used to, but now I absolutely love it. One of the things I like is that I can make a playlist. Once the playlist is done, it picks similar songs which helps broaden my music tastes. There are quite a number of channels to choose from for whatever mood I happen to be in. I am pleased with the music choices that come up on my app. I love it!
title: Love it!

review: Great selection of music for all genres and at a reasonable price.   I love Rock, Bluegrass, Country, and Christmas music.   I‚Äôve been able to find all the artists I search for.   You can build your own station with 1000s of songs not just the top 25 like SiriusXM.   There is some great music out there.  Discover it!   Just wish I could play it in my car but my radio only syncs in with Pandora.
title: Great App!

review: I find the app easy to use and use it frequently. But I make songs and playlists and then find songs  taken away because they moved them to unlimited. I tried unlimited for a brief time but it didn‚Äôt apply to all my devices and couldn‚Äôt use when I switched devices and refuse to pay more than one fee. Sometimes I just purchase favorite songs that are MUST HAVE.
title: Good app but they take songs away...

review:
So. Upgraded to Unlimited, hoping that the paid version would reward me with a seamless app for my hard earned $$. All I got is more music to stop playing in the middle of the song. Which is especially irritating because the majority of my music experience is playing songs to put my two year old asleep! Crash! First song, every time. 

Pluses: Less expensive if you are a Prime Member. 
Lyrics. Rare in this age of streaming, especially if you like karaoke. Playlists. Entire albums can be played in sequential order.
title: Crashes every time. EVERY TIME!

review:
There are millions of songs in the database but they just don‚Äôt do a good enough job of giving you suggestions based on them. I tend to hear the same songs multiple times and have to do a lot more searching for new music than I‚Äôd like to, even though I tend to thumbs up a lot of what I listen to. 

Other than that, I enjoy making multiple playlists for my workouts.
title: Needs more randomization for songs

review: Enjoy the service very much! but sometimes  songs ‚Äúdisappear ‚Äú for some reason ( one example was some songs from the group Oasis) also have some songs where the audio is very faint (quite a few from the Beatles greatest hits list so have to delete those). Easier to use than iTunes, thanks and may I add that i have tried numerous nicknames to get this done and they are all taken. Why Can‚Äôt I send without one??
title: Review

review: The app updated today and all my music disappeared. I can‚Äôt find an email on th app to contact someone, but I need this fixed or I will be cancelling my subscription. If I have to start from scratch it‚Äôs not worth it to me right now. Some how all the playlists I follow didn‚Äôt disappear though. I tried restarting my phone and that did not work. Please help.
title: Loved until today

review: I love all the different genres of music i can listen too, but i keep getting a message that says error due to low internet. My office has wifi and a box for stronger signal. I have to hit the play button after every single song.  Its so frustrating and unacceptable.  I even switched it to off line and says i have to have internet. I shouldn‚Äôt have to when I download music to my phone.  Any suggestions
title: Streaming

review:
Unless you pay, they now stop playing music after 1 hr. So you‚Äôll spend a ton of time adding music, then you‚Äôll hit play and it shuts off after an hour- don‚Äôt worry, it‚Äôll have an add for you to spend even more than what you pay for prime in order for it to play for more than an hour. 

Loved it before this change but I‚Äôm back to Pandora because of it. 

FYI, I‚Äôm a firefighter with some trouble shutting my mind off, I used to play music to sleep, now it stops playing right when I need it most, that‚Äôs probably why I‚Äôm bitter...
title: Used to be awesome

review:
My peeves are these. 
  If you have multiple versions of a song by the same or various artists, the app like to play that song over and over no matter who performs it. That‚Äôs annoying because i didn‚Äôt not want to hear the same song again.
  The app does not equalize the volume that well. I find myself adjusting the volume frequently.....that‚Äôs annoying.
    Other than these peeves I like the app.
title: Very Good .....But

review: What happened to being able to being able to change the order of my songs in my playlists?!!??  Now when you hit edit in playlist, you can‚Äôt change the order of the songs anymore, all you can do now in playlist editing is delete songs!  You used to be able to edit the order of songs in your playlists, this feature needs to be restored by easily hitting the edit button again like it used to work.  Please fix this ASAP then I will consider re-reviewing, thanks.!
title: Bad update/DON‚ÄôT update can‚Äôt edit song order in playlists anymore!!

review: The best music app I‚Äôve used so far! Every artist I add or search for seems to have their entire library of albums. This app is very smart and always gives me many artists to check out that are similar to the ones I like...once in awhile they throw one my way that I never would have thought of. And it‚Äôs always a winner! They really seem to know in depth all genres! Good job!
title: Chef Druid

review: Great service to have as a free add on to my prime membership. The selection is limited but considering it‚Äôs a bonus, I‚Äôm not mad. The only thing I can say is I wish they didn‚Äôt show the ‚Äúget unlimited‚Äù ad/speedbump screen each time you launch the app. I have to say no, over and over again. Even if it could just be less frequent that‚Äôd be great.
title: Great except for the unlimited push

review: We can listen to the music we want, each in our own device. It is fun to see the lyrics as the music plays. There are so many playlists for every mood. I love the ones for running. And of course it is even more fun if you have and Alexa, or a couple because you can play the music through the whole house and entertain your parties.
title: Me and my family love this app

review: I enjoy the app and would like if it had a built in EQ that would not need prime unlimited. I feel this would make the app more enjoyable for your prime customers. Also the app lags when you start a song it won‚Äôt play and won‚Äôt respond for about 20 seconds. And the app doesn‚Äôt respond when I plug it into my vehicle. And the status bar goes crazy when I use the app. Please fix.  I love the app. Thanks!
title: Please ad a bass boost and fix bugs.

review: Ever since the app icon was updated to this current blue version, I‚Äôve been getting nothing but failed connections when loading my music. Another issue is, I‚Äôve been hearing a loud scratch sound near the beginning of a song. Even after the multiple updates, these same issues still occur. Please fix this.
title: Loading issues

review: I love and prefer to use this music app. It is by far the easiest to use and friendly.  The only issue is that they stopped allowing users to upload music purchased directly from the source ‚Äîsuch as the label or artist, onto the App. This is a new issue and sincerely hope that the app changes back to the former operating system.
title: I love the app bring back uploading purchased music

review:
Good solid app for playing music. But lacks some basic features available in other players such as ability to rate songs in your library.

In addition, parts of the user interface are non-intuitive (like how to quickly revert back to an expanded view of the song that is currently playing if you are browsing other songs).
title: Works, but not the most feature rich player

review:
I‚Äôm really enjoying the My Soundtrack station. It plays old music I‚Äôve forgotten and plays unfamiliar songs from similar artists. 
   The key is to thumbs up or down songs the station plays. 
   The ability to download songs for offline listening is huge. I save lots of data while away from home listening to my favorite songs.
title: Great features, versatility

review: Coupled with Alexa and a few echo dots Around the house and patio I am listening to music like I did as a teen (decades ago!) and with decent sound quality.  Life with more music is just ‚Äúmore better‚Äù!  And at either the touch of my fingers or the sound of my voice.  Love all the extra features too!  The app is very user friendly and easy to learn.  In fact I‚Äôm using it as I type this review!  üòÅ
title: I LOVE THIS APP

review: One night we were with some of our adult kids and started talking about music from the past and we were curious what songs they knew it might recognize from their parents teenage years and so for about 45 minutes we listen to one song after another, i was amazed they knew as many songs from my decade as they did!
title: Great source of music

review: I like the app but don't like that after I download the music to my phone that it sometimes will make the music unavailable because it needs to refresh. The point of me downloading to my phone is so that I don't stream and use all my data. Yes, it takes only a few moments to use the data to refresh it and continue to use music but if I'm out of data and no where near wifi in just out of luck.
title: Used to be good

review: i like the app and its song choices, but it did have alot of app crashes and my app would crash when i tried to open it and i couldn't use it for like 4 months. Recently its been just static music and it just stops and exit out of the app. Dont know why, but other people seem to be having the same problem,
title: Could be better

review: Has many of the functions of other streaming music apps. However the algorithm isn‚Äôt as great as others. The stations are more like play lists so they are very repetitive, e.g., plays the same songs regardless of your like/dislike post (thumbs up/down). Moreover, the variety of artists on the stations are limited. For example you may play your favorite artist and the similar artists the app plays on the station is limited; you‚Äôll hear the same four or five artists:(
title: Good. Could be better...

review: When I want to shuffle a playlist at school or on the way to work, I click the shuffle button at the top of the playlist. However, a given song will often play twice before I even hear another song in the playlist. Even more infuriating, when I click on a particular song in the playlist I want to hear, it plays that song and then reverts to playing the songs one after another in the order I added them to the playlist. Otherwise, pretty good selection and UI. My Music feature is worthless. One star for dev visibility.
title: Shuffle Needs Work

review: I love this app and i use it for almost all of my music but a few improvements could be made. It would be nice if the playlists were a bit more customizable. I would like to be able to add my own playlist cover and move the playlist around more easily. The Alexa feature is cool but could also use some improvement. Other than that it‚Äôs a really good platform.
title: Love the app but could be better

review: I like this app, and selection of music, but it cuts off on the first song while driving every time. This happens if I‚Äôm in drive mode or not. If I want to keep listening, I have to close the app and re-start. After the re-start, it continues to play without interruption. Can the developers help with this? This does not make it safer to use while driving. Sometimes, I just use a different streaming platform out of frustration. Thank you.
title: Like the Selection, but Cuts Off Mid Song

review: Almost every song including some underground music. Very good hard rock / metal selection. Playlists and suggested bands are a great option too. Probably found 1/3 of my songs that way. Offline mode saves data on my phone. I just found out it syncs with Waze so when you‚Äôre driving you can use Waze and hit a button to change songs.
title: Great app

review: It‚Äôs been happening a lot recently, where I‚Äôll be playing a song then all of a sudden it just glitches and almost sounds like static, like it literally sounds like KENDJFBDISBCJRNSKFJF, and then it either plays a different song, or starts over. It only used to happen once and a while on a specific song but, now it‚Äôs happening all the time and it‚Äôs super super annoying.
title: It‚Äôs great but has a problem

review: The user I terrace needs improvement. I have found issues finding my music easily or looking for ‚Äòstations‚Äô based on artists.  Another feature missing is the ability to stream your music across your home network  at a push of the button. Example, I would like to send my songs to Sonos, or my AV receiver through my phone. Last but not least, the app is buggy when connected to Apple Car Play.
title: User Interface Needs Improvement

review: I am a big music lover, not so much popular, but more of a musicians type of music fan. Love a wide variety of music and enjoy the highest quality source I can get, next to listening to DSD‚Äôs Amazon‚Äôs HD Music is the best option around. Would love to have some local little guy to get a subscription from, but reality being what it is, Bezos wins out big time.
title: Amazing selection of high quality recordings

review: I love this app, with one exception. If I‚Äôm listening to music via Bluetooth (from my phone) in my truck, and I turn the truck off then back on (after a pit stop), the app automatically shuts down a few minutes after the truck restarts. I have to go back into my phone and restart the app to resume music. Other music apps don‚Äôt have this problem. I‚Äôm using an iPhone 12. Fix this issue and this will be my go-to app!
title: App problems when Bluetooth connected to my truck

review: A couple years using unlimited and never an issue.  Would give 5 stars.  However the past couple days have glitched.  Told me I was canceled and took half my library off.  If you speak english, 4get about calling for help as nothing seems to work describing the issue online as well.  They gave me the run around telling me to talk to apple.  And so on.
title: Was great. Needs english reps.

review: So when using this app through CarPlay, it is very frustrating... if you just want to shuffle your music it works ok, but if you want to find a specific song or artist it is lacking. Also, the sound quality is lacking.. if you have a good sounding stereo system it will be deprived of a good audio source here... no equalizer, tone control or level matching... one song may sound good, the next one like a tin can
title: Poor user interface .. bad sound quality

review: This app is the only app I use to listen to music. Though it may not have some of the newest songs I‚Äôm looking for, it definitely has most of my favorites. This app is especially great when you upgrade to premium. Tons of songs I never even knew existed. AM also send you song suggestions based on what you‚Äôve been listening to. It‚Äôs great üëçüèº
title: Really great app

review: This is the best. It works everywhere and you can get a family plan too. You can make playlists and download music, plus it‚Äôs free to get. You should totally get this app. IT‚ÄôS THE BEST! You can get any music anywhere at any time. Sure there are some flaws but none are like sooooo bad, you barley even notice them there so small. You should definitely get this app it‚Äôs totally worth it.
title: So good

review: Great selection of music, fairly easy to use, 10 times better than iTunes.  I mark off one star as navigation through your music, playlists, suggestions, etc...is not as seamless as I would like.  I knock off a second star because when you go in offline music mode, you end up with multiples of one playlist with different numbers of songs.  That‚Äôs annoying. Offline should mirror online especially if you have the playlist downloads
title: Very very good.

review: I give the app 3 stars because of how pushy it is to get unlimited while not being actually big free. I understand that all the prime music is ‚Äúfree‚Äù except it isn‚Äôt because we pay for prime ( no matter how little people think that is). That being said I have had several issues with the app, sometimes it doesn‚Äôt want to play songs and has to be restarted, sometimes it shows the wrong song is playing and other little things.
title: Really pushes for unlimited

review: so this is a great app and stuff, love the music and it‚Äôs free and stuff, it‚Äôs great. I just have one thing that I would like changed. I had Maniac and Rockstar in my music and I love those songs so much but they put them into the unlimited section and same thing with modern loneliness. review:

All in all, great app would recommend and users on prime to prime plus or whatever has it good. My Soundtrack radio is great feature, keep that up.
title: Richpark90

review: I‚Äôm a 68 year old great mother, whose been stuck in the house since February, 2020 due to (Cov-19 Coronavirus) my daughter‚Äôs won‚Äôt let me out of the house, one of my daughters saw I was getting bored with her choice of music (I didn‚Äôt like all the cursing).  She showed me how to do my on playlist, OMG so many selections ( Frank Sinatra, Elvis, Etta James, Beatles, Gospel music) and the list goes on and on.  I‚Äôve over 900 songs on my Playlist, now my daughter says my music is boring ü§£.  Thank you üôè you saved me.
title: Wow!!!

review: This app has almost ANY song you can think of and almost every artist you love. I sometimes encounter issues when I‚Äôm using the app with CarPlay, where the music will load for a 2-5 minutes and won‚Äôt play or where it will just stop playing altogether even on downloaded content. Other than my qualms with CarPlay I love everything about this app. Great investment.
title: Best Music App

review: The latest update got rid of the ‚ÄúGenre‚Äù tab under My Music. I don‚Äôt have tons of free time to create playlists, so after adding songs to my music, I would just go to the Genre tab and choose whatever I felt like. It would play anything new or old under whatever genre I picked with all kinds of variety. No need to create playlists. Now, I have to choose by artist or Albums and constantly going back in, interrupting work on the regular. Not fun when it‚Äôs a busy work day. Still love the app, but being Genre back. Please!!
title: Got rid of the ‚ÄúGenre‚Äù tab.

review: I love the selection and variety of music! The only complaint I have is that it doesn‚Äôt connect as well as Pandora. I commute a very long distance for work and sometimes it will say ‚Äúwaiting‚Äù which may as well be the AOL version of buffering because nothing will play for an extended period of time. I have to close and re open the app to sometimes get it to work. If you can fix this, I will definitely subscribe after my free trial is over.
title: Love the selection, connectivity spotty

review:
The title says it all. 

1. It often will not acknowledge a change to output destination.  So kill the app and start over. Or use iTunes. 

2. If often hangs and the only way to "fix" it is to kill it and start again. It handles network issues badly 

3. It was causing my phone to restart. Now it just crashes on a daily basis. 

4. It keeps aking for a review but what other tool is an option? It makes 0 sense to rate it but since you keep asking I'll let you know what I think. 

5. It often seems confused about what I have offline when in offline mode. 

6. Why do you lose/change my history (track differently) between offline and online play? Don‚Äôt say security that‚Äôs bs. 

Overall I manage fine but I think the reliability is crap, the UI is a mess, and if there were other options I'd try them.
title: Even though you have to use it at least it's a buggy mess

review: This app is great for listening to music but whenever I don‚Äôt have my phone and just my watch, it pains me cause you guys don‚Äôt have an Apple Watch app for this yet. I don‚Äôt want to buy Apple Music just for the watch. Can u please make the app on watch. Or make Alexa on watch. It would be much appreciated. Especially for someone who can‚Äôt bring their phone everywhere : (
title: Great app one problem

review: My thing is with this app is I don‚Äôt understand why every time I go play my music it only plays for a minute or two then skeps to the next the song. I don‚Äôt understand why this is happening when it was just working yesterday morning. All I‚Äôm saying is this better get fix otherwise they‚Äôre going to get nonstop complaints from me.
title: Better fix it!!

review: I love this app, I like how you don‚Äôt have to pay for songs you can look up the song and add it to your playlist. I have an Alexa so it‚Äôs cool how I can connect my Alexa and choose certain songs to play. I define recommend this app even if you don‚Äôt have an Alexa, it‚Äôs still a really nice app instead of having to paying for every song you want to add to your playlist.
title: 5/5 stars!

review:
We got Prime for the streaming video, but now that we have it, I've found that this is an excellent companion product. 

I especially enjoy the Stations - it's a great way to listen to a good mix, without having to take the time to set up playlists. 

It would be nice however if I could create blended stations, combining multiple artists or genres as the seed.
title: My current go-to Music app

review: The latest version of your app is more difficult to navigate and find music. It seems the more you integrate with Alexa the clumsier your app becomes. If you are going to make radical changes to your app, you need to create and easy to follow video or tutorial for your user. Right now I am entirely frustrated with the changes you‚Äôve recently made and it makes me want to try other services.
title: Sometimes change is not good.

review: This app works great it‚Äôs easy to make a playlist and It doesn‚Äôt shuffle play which I like so I can just play a song that I want. The Alexa works good to and whenever you want to play a song you can just ask it. You can also ask the Alexa to play one of your playlist too! The quality is over all really good too I personally think you should get this app.
title: 5 stars!

review:
I used to say I'd rate 5 stars, but lately has been buggy. Also, as I get good playlists built they take music off the service. I will update back to 5 stars when I see all the black Keyes songs are put back on that used to be there...

Update: thanks for putting some of the albums back. 5 stars. It has not been buggy anymore. :-)
title: Don't get too used to your playlists...

review: Great easy to use app. Multiple ways to view lists, artists, albums etc. I‚Äôve changed to ONLY this app for music now.  Only complaint- artists come and go so sometimes you‚Äôll download something and it‚Äôs not available later.  But I‚Äôm sure that happens anywhere.  Paying a monthly flat rate makes that excusable. title: Love this App

review: I like the app. I have made several upgrades for my Echo dots. Now I have a unlimited music and a family plan to stream on multiple devices. Lately, it‚Äôs been refusing to play anything at all from my phone. I need to call or email someone but I thought this review request may serve the same purpose. For the most part it works fine but when it doesn‚Äôt, it‚Äôs very disappointing considering I‚Äôve made so many additions to my account.

But being able to download albums and songs when on WiFi saves data on music I don‚Äôt have to stream while not on WiFi.
title: Download and Stream

Also, it would be nice if it were easier to delete music from my library that is "no longer available". review: It‚Äôs a pretty good app and after my trial I‚Äôm considering paying to keep the service but sometimes it just stops playing the music and then I look at my phone and the player on the lock screen is gone and when I open my phone I realized the app crashed. It‚Äôs pretty annoying. A couple times it happened while on the app. I‚Äôll have to think about if it‚Äôs worth it by the time my trial ends.
title: Crashes A Lot

review: so it works perfectly and even if you don't pay for it, there aren't any ads üëå. I pay for it and i love it even more, the selection of songs and the easy-to-navagate buttons and screens are great as well. the only issue i have is that sometimes it won't connect to my data, but i think that my be an issue with my phone, not the app.
title: 5 stars!

review:
Program seems uncontrollable. Sometimes it plays the playlist without any problems. Other times it cuts off and is difficult to get restarted. When driving or riding motorcycle you basically have to stop and fiddle with it, which after twice sort of defeats the purpose. 
The selection is excellent and when home on WiFi it is amazing. The lyrics feature is great.
title: Unreliable playback

review: This is included with your Prime membership which is something I failed to notice until having been a subscriber for several years.  Nearly anything you can think of is on here and it‚Äôs easy to download albums to your device and play them offline.  If you have Prime and don‚Äôt have this you have to get it!

review: I‚Äôm so glad I bit the bullet and signed up for Prime.  I listen to music all the time so like the variety of songs offered.  I also like the playlist mixes from jazz to country.  I went ahead and signed up for unlimited and surprised of all the options available.  Having lyrics for most of the songs is a great feature - I can sing along to my favorite songs!  Great App!!

review: I‚Äôm really disappointed in what a pain it is to get a song to play after a search. If I enter a song title and the artist‚Äôs name, I expect to get a return that allows me to play that song with one touch. At the most the options should be different versions of THAT song by THAT artist. If you want to add other artists or other songs by the same name, or album choices, put them in a separate section, or at least listed AFTER the requested artist/song.

review: Now that I‚Äôve started using prime music, I‚Äôm not sure why someone would pay for a music service. I understand that I pay for Prime but that more than pays for itself with saved shipping costs so this is an added bonus. I suppose if you have very specific music taste this may not work for you but I can usually find a play list to suit my mood.
title: Why pay more?

review: The setup is easy to scroll through and the text is easy to read. Offline downloading is Great when not near good Wifi. This may all seem to like I have never seen download before but other sites take much longer. Thanks again for a great app.
title: Awesome App.

review:
The only reason I do not give a 5 star is because I can not undo a thumbs down, or visit the songs Ive given a thumbs Dow. It would be nice to view a list of all the songs that I gave thumbs up.
It would also be nice if genre was a way to know if a particular song is in more than one play list.
And finally if the pre made lists do not always play In same order, but instead shuffled all the time.

Hopefully these issues will be sorted soon because I‚Äôm over the constant errors.

Like, if I want to add a playlist to another playlist I have to hand add every tiny songüò°ü•µI can‚Äôt just click on the playlist and add it. Second, ALL the good songs are on unlimited which, I have to purchase to access it. It‚Äôs a small amount of money at FIRST but, in the end it adds up. Which, I did the math it‚Äôs over 130$ A year! If you ask me that‚Äôs to much. So, all in all, I believe they should fix the bugs and lower the price.‚¨áÔ∏è‚¨áÔ∏èüíµ üö´üö´ü™≤
title: Non-Unlimited

review: i love this app but it‚Äôs really hard to find the exact song i want to play in my playlist i have to scroll over and over and over again to find the song. you guys should add a search engine into the playlist as well so we can type the song we want instead of scrolling through our songs trying to find it.

title: Crashing.

title: Convenient and much easier to use than other apps

review:
May 29, 2020 Update - I‚Äôm leaving my review at 4 stars:

title: Less than Excellent

review: Prime music is changing my life. I had been holding on to iTunes just because I didn't have to time to look into anything different. Couldn't be happier!
title: Love!

review: The bottom line is that there is a lot of music available to listen to for no additional cost on your Prime membership.  It's a really nice perk for Prime, and the app is stable.  If you add Unlimited, you get into the range of ‚Äúpractically all the music on the planet‚Äù, which is usually enough to keep you from being bored at least!
title: Best add-on feature that money never bought

review: Really really great but thanking of going back to old music source because now you have to have two accounts to listen to music use to be able to listen to everything but now you have to pay for prime music with your prime account I hate that it‚Äôs a rip off to have to pay for both when your already a prime member

Music quality is awesome too.  Little heavy on the data usage if you‚Äôre not on WiFi but overall, this is a must have if you live by the rhythm and melody that starts your day!

title: Good app, great selection, shuffle not so much

review:
This is really the only music service  I  ‚Äòpay‚Äô for.  I have the rest as ‚Äòfree‚Äô subscriptions.

The only thing I wish is that they put more features on the player like loop repeating a section and speed control as I love to practice my guitar sometimes.
title: Couldn‚Äôt be happier!

Overall, it is an awesome app.

review: Generally I love the app - use it all the time, downloaded a few song‚Äôs for offline play, have playlists for my kids, working out, etc. BUT the latest update removed the Genres menu, JUST before Christmas when I would normally just shuffle within the holiday music genre! I like to curate my music and not use their standard mixes. Bring back the genre section!!!

review: The app works great.  Being a prime member has saved me a lot of money.  It is time consuming to find, add, and download songs I want but you don't have to pay for them.  I'm able to check out new music before I buy it.  Which is funny because I probably will end up buying some of the music I've been listening too.  But really less than 5%.
title: Awesome

review:
This app must be completely revamped as it is not the least bit intuitive how a playlist is created or even how songs or albums are added to a queue. The basic operations a user would want to execute are:
(1) search for a song or album
(2) add a song or album to a ‚Äònow playing‚Äô queue 
(3) edit that queue to change the order of songs or even remove some of them.
(4) save that queue as a playlist

Only step (1) is intuitive with this app. After over an hour with the app I still don‚Äôt know how to do (2)-(4) which is very frustrating. For a brilliantly executed implementation of these steps see the iPeng app for the sadly erstwhile Squeezebox.
title: Remarkably Frustrating To Use!

review: Wish you didn't need an internet  connection to refresh your songs so often. Would have been better to be able to keep tour songs offline for as long as you have Prime instead of the need to refresh your list. Has happened to me twice now when I was somewhere there was no internet.
title: Prime music

review: I love this app, I‚Äôm just now getting a message ‚Äúfailed due to network error. Retry when you have a stronger network connection.‚Äù This happens even when am at home on WiFi! It only started do this last week...I‚Äôve even deleted the app & installed it again, still the same problem..I‚Äôm hoping they will fit it soon!
title: Stopping in mid streaming

review: This is another perk in Prime membership. It's easy to use, convenient, and most of the music you purchase through Amazon--whether disc or digital--is automatically added to your personal collection. It is a selective music service, so it is a nice alternative to Pandora when you get sick of hearing the same tracks over and over.
title: Perfect compliment to Pandora

review:
I loved the app, but am frustrated by the lack of organizational abilities, like alphabetical or better genres. I would love to be able to organize my playlists songs alphabetically. 

The playlists have also been lagging A LOT the past couple of months. Scrolling while looking for a certain song leaves me wanting to just close it. Not to mention the crashes and lag when loading songs.

The other major complaint is that many of songs are later not available for use when you go to listen to them.  This bugs me, when you have paid the monthly fee to have access only to find they have been removed.
title: Fairly good, but needs updates

review: That‚Äôs it.  Exactly what I was looking for, easy to use, playlists, gigantic library, I just add to my music and shuffle from whole thing, I have 15+ hours of music so far and does really well on road trips with a solid coverage cell carrier like Verizon (US Cellular 4g coverage area is microscopic, look it up.  This is why I switched carriers while on vacation in Texas....)
title: Solid Price and Excellent Library

review:
I use it exclusively. Don't listen on any other app
Has everything I need. The offline feature is great especially on a plane. 
The feature where you can see similar artists is a great feature. I have discovered new artists that way. Also like when you follow an artist and it notifies me of a new single or album release! Great work!!!

My only complaint would be that when you are listening to a certain playlist and then stop the music for a while and then go back to pickup where you left off, the app doesn‚Äôt remember which playlist where you left off but only remembers the song you played. No big deal. Just would be nice. 

Great overall!
title: Love the app!

I specially like the fact that you can download your songs in high quality so you are not blowing through your data during long trips.

My son introduced me to this and it has been wonderful ..an entire world of music which plays over myOontz .. like being able to add favorites to my music.  Thank you for this format.   Joan Davidson
title: Music

It‚Äôs worth the $0.99 but we will see if it‚Äôs worth $11/month.  $2.99 would have been a definite yes but that is a little high for something I use often but not all the time.

I have been using this app for awhile now. I really like the convenience of using it . The playlists are awesome, and I discover new music through them. title: GET THE GAME!!!üòª

review:
The app doesn‚Äôt pull all available music based on plan when searching. Also, it is near impossible to get songs to add to a playlist when you are listening to them, my music library is always ‚Äúrefreshing‚Äù when I try.

title: Great Music...app falling short still

Hatch

title: Love it!

review:
The bar isn‚Äôt very high, but somehow, Amazon‚Äôs music player lags behind the others.

Briefly:

‚Ä¢ Routinely gets stuck in a state where the player freezes. You‚Äôre stuck trying several things to get it to play again - reboot app, switch signal types (wifi, cellular). I thought maybe it was just my phone but after upgrading hardware, still experienced the same issues.

‚Ä¢ Could do a better job remembering where you left off in your song or playlist. You‚Äôre often left ‚Äústarting over,‚Äù looking for that song or playlist manually.

‚Ä¢ Control Center very rarely functions (the app doesn‚Äôt seem to be pushing currently playing, ffwd, rwd, bluetooth options out to Control Center). 

‚Ä¢ Overall, the app could be faster and snap more responsively.

title: Nothing Is Perfect‚Ä¶

review:
At random intervals, this app will attempt to force itself to go into online mode. Thats highly annoying. Anyways, here are pros and cons:

Pros:

‚Ä¢Stores music on the device and plays these audio clips with high fidelity

‚Ä¢Beautiful and intuitive menu systems

Cons:

‚Ä¢Most music is locked behind a pay wall

‚Ä¢Will not stay in offline mode in any circumstance

‚Ä¢Will forcibly turn itself from offline to online mode at random when you do not have wifi or a cell signal, which halts the music

‚Ä¢Obnoxious advertisements with small close buttons squeezed next to massive "Give me money" buttons

‚Ä¢Inefficient file storage method

__________________________________

Overall, when the app stays in offline mode, its a handy music player. The menus are nice, and though most music is behind a paywall, those items are clearly labelled as such. Two stars.

title: Just two things I would like to change

review:
Has a vast music library.
I like the moods selection. 
Downsides:
1. iPhone interface is difficult to see, it‚Äôs too dark.  I use it in my car. It needs a fat-button, easy to use mode for driving that takes risk out and is simpler and safer to use. 
2. Classical and operatic collection, and the genre differentiation, could be better. For example, should be able to search for classical guitar without Mozart and Jimmy Hendrix popping up. (Not exactly what happened, but you get the picture). 
3. Downloads disappear and become unavailable afterward. Frustrating. 
4. Allow me to reclassify the genre of an album or a song if it‚Äôs not accurate. There are dozens of ‚Äúrock‚Äù and ‚Äúalternative‚Äù that are off. Again, many kinds of ‚Äúclassical‚Äù music, it‚Äôs not just a catch-all for ‚Äúold music with violins‚Äù.
title: Decent

There were times  when I clicked to download songs but they didn‚Äôt download even though I had WiFi connection. 

Anyway, I like it and will continue to use it.

review:
I enjoy having these songs available for road trips, but the app is not very user friendly and can be downright frustrating at times. 

For the app developers:
1) When looking at playlists, why can‚Äôt I go in to the playlist and look at a list of songs? Right now the only option is to start listening to the playlist.
2) When a song plays in a playlist that I like, why is it impossible to look into that artist to see other songs available to potentially add them to my music?
3) Attempting to delete multiple songs from my own created playlist is horribly tedious in the app.

There are other frustrating things with this app, but these are probably my top 3 issues right now. The app could be great...but it needs some work.

review: Its a good app. for unlimited music, i switched to it from Apple music. There are good stations on here for sure. The only thing i find annoying is having to hit the play button twice everytime. I hit the play button once and it pauses the song and then when i hit it again is that it actually plays the song.
title: Its good

review: We have prime, so for a free service, it‚Äôs not terrible.  Songs are constantly removed from libraries and playlists.  Although they can sometimes be found again, you can‚Äôt put them back in order in the playlist.  This is nothing new, it‚Äôs been happening for years and can be extremely annoying.  Also only 1 device can stream unless you want to spend $15 a month on the family plan.  If you don‚Äôt have prime, save your money and use another streaming service.
title: Review

review: Every time I start listening to music, I know in the first song the music will suddenly stop. Sometimes it kicks me out of the app entirely, sometimes it just wants me to see the pop up with the unlimited purchase option, and sometimes it asks for a rating. Unfortunately, that caused my rating to drop to 3 stars instead of 5. So frustrating to have to restart EVERY time! Maybe putting this review in will help.
title: Great, except one small problem.

review: They have any & ALL music. From popular to hard to find 1 hit wonders, upcoming bands, you name it. Easy to make playlists that are accessible on & offline for those times cell service is spotty. Love that I don‚Äôt have to purchase the songs, just everything for one price. Have tried others, none compare. Worth the money!
title: Excellent!

review: The app is great all you have to do is make a playlist and then tap my music and then you get all the songs you want on your playlist and then you can delete songs from your playlist to I love this app it‚Äôs just as good as every other app and it‚Äôs pretty cheap for not much money a month Has all the new songs that come out
title: Scoot

review: Always a voice command away anything I want to hear! Thank You I barely snuck in behind the tech learning curve.  My kids set up our retirement SONOS system everywhere with Alexa connection. 2:00PM, a cocktail, my feet up on the upper deck looking down the length of the lake, and I say. ‚ÄúAlexa, play Diana Krall on Deck Zone, have her tell me how marvelous I am.‚Äù And Amorim music answers the call, heaven!
title: Always a voice command away

review: This version of the AMP is much better than previous versions. They fixed some bugs. There is still a really annoying one. If I press previous track, it takes it to the next track. Not the previous one. Other than that, it‚Äôs a great app. I like it much more than Apple Music/iTunes.
title: Many improvements

review:
The option to quickly add any artist, song along with the quick option to remove it and being able to play anywhere is fantastic. It is the only music app, I use all day long ir as long as I can listen to music. In my traveling, at work, and at home.

A big help in keeping me Sane during these times
